lines: the 3m scotchcal changeable translucent graphic film ij63-20 is a translucent, matte, 3.2 mil (0.08 mm) vinyl film that has a changeable, pressure-sensitive adhesive
this 3.2 mil (0.08 mm), matte vinyl film has a changeable, pressure-sensitive adhesive
3m scotchcal changeable translucent graphic film, ij63-20, white, 54 in x 50 yd (140 cm x 45.7 m)
it can be used used for promotional graphics such as signs, trade show, point-of-purchase displays, windows, and taxi tops
to be used with solvent or uv piezo inkjet or screen printing ink.
this film is ideal for short-term backlit and window applications.
removes easily without heat, leaving little adhesive residue
use with solvent, uv, latex inkjet, or screen printing inks
